name: No Time to Drown
description:
DESCRIPTION

2D roguelike fast-paced fun game that takes place on a river. The player takes control of a buff long-haired bearded man who got lost. The mission is to build a raft and race downriver, collecting resources and crafting new raft parts along the way. The player must navigate through obstacles that can destroy the raft, and must prevent the raft from sinking. 

CONTROLS

WASD - movement
Space - dash
E - interact (shoot from cannon)
LMB - pick up/place block
RMB / R - rotate block
